description: NTS Map:92B11.  A walk from the Caleb Pike trailhead to Jocelyn Hill, via the Ridge Top Trail in Gowlland Tod Provincial Park. Total 575 metres ascent return.Excellent views of Saanich Inlet and the Gulf Islands from the summit and from the trail along the way.  So many arbutus trees, a feast for your eyes.A few pictures are posted on the web:UVIC physics link
directions: Follow Millstream Road north from Trans Canada Highway approx. 5 kms to the posted parking area and trailhead on Caleb Pike Road. Follow the entrance to Ridge Top Trail, and after 150 m, turn right towards Holmes Peak and Jocelyn Hill
title: Jocelyn Hill
